entry.title: Thursday night: Light snow. Temperature rising to minus 8 by morning.
entry.summary: Partly cloudy. Becoming cloudy late this evening then light snow. Wind east 20 km/h gusting to 40. Temperature rising to minus 8 by morning. Wind chill near minus 19. Forecast issued 3:30 PM EST Thursday 29 December 2022

entry.title: Friday: Snow. High minus 6.
entry.summary: Snow. Wind east 20 km/h gusting to 40 becoming light near noon. High minus 6. Wind chill minus 15 in the morning and minus 10 in the afternoon. Forecast issued 3:30 PM EST Thursday 29 December 2022

entry.title: Friday night: A few flurries. Temperature steady near minus 7.
entry.summary: Flurries. Wind becoming west 20 km/h near midnight. Temperature steady near minus 7. Wind chill minus 11 in the evening and minus 16 overnight. Forecast issued 3:30 PM EST Thursday 29 December 2022
